document_title: Diarrhea: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Diarrhea is easily spread and has dangerous complications, but it can be completely prevented from the beginning. Some useful measures that can be applied include: (7)
Enhance personal hygiene, environment, living space,...; Ensuring food safety and hygiene, eating cooked food, drinking boiled water.; Ensure use of clean water sources for daily activities; Water protection.; Take appropriate measures when someone has acute diarrhea.; Update knowledge about the spread of bacteria that cause diarrhea.
